titles: The history of Henry IV. surnamed the Great, King of France and Navarre Written originally in French, by the Bishop of Rodez, once tutor to his now most Christian Majesty; and made English by J. D.
Histoire du roy Henry le Grand. English.
author: Péréfixe de Beaumont, Hardouin de, b. 1605.
Davies, John, 1625-1693, attributed name.
Dauncey, John, fl. 1663, attributed name.
publisher: printed by James Cottrel, for Samuel Speed, at the signe of the Rainbow near the Inner Temple-gate in Fleet-street,
notes: A translation of: Péréfixe, Hardouin de Beaumont de. Histoire du roy Henry le Grand.
J.D. = John Davies of Kidwelly, or John Dauncey.
Running title reads: The history of Henry the Great.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Henry --  IV, --  King of France, 1553-1610 --  Early works to 1800.
